historical_note: The 55th Savona Division was destroyed during Operation Crusader in November 1941. According to the Order of Battle of the Italian Army (US Army G2 Intelligence, July 1943), the unit 'Lost its artillery regiment during British advance in winter of 1940-41. Destroyed in November 1941.' This unit did NOT exist in 1942-Q1 (January-March 1942). The seed file incorrectly lists this unit as existing in quarters 1942-Q1, 1942-Q2, and 1942-Q3, which is historically impossible. This stub file documents the data quality issue in the seed file.

sources.title: Order of Battle of the Italian Army
sources.author: US Army G-2 Intelligence
sources.notes: Official US military intelligence document confirming destruction in November 1941

validation.seed_file_error: Seed file lists unit for 1942-Q1, 1942-Q2, and 1942-Q3 despite destruction 2-8 months prior
validation.required_action: Remove quarters 1942-Q1, 1942-Q2, 1942-Q3 from seed file entry for Savona Division
